org.jgrapht.graph

Class SimpleDirectedGraph<V,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractGraph<V,E>
      • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractBaseGraph<V,E>
        • org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleDirectedGraph<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the graph vertex type
    E - the graph edge type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Graph<V,E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedAcyclicGraph, SimpleDirectedWeightedGraph

    public class SimpleDirectedGraph<V,E>
extends AbstractBaseGraph<V,E>
    A simple directed graph. A simple directed graph is a directed graph in which neither multiple (parallel) edges between any two vertices nor loops are permitted.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
